definition: to target/to focus on/to be aimed at or against/in response to
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: We have disputed about this issue many times.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经针对这个议题吵过好多次了。

sentences.english: The government already has started planning a three-year rebuilding effort for the areas damaged by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 政府已开始针对地震灾区制定为期三年的重建计划。

sentences.english: Blum offers practical fittings solutions for five kitchen zones.
sentences.chinese: 百隆针对五个厨房区域提供实用的五金解决方案。

sentences.english: This paper mainly aims at the re-development of the construction drawing parts in TLJCAD.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要针对TLJCAD施工图部分进行再开发。

sentences.english: At last, the approach is supplemented according to the value leakage.
sentences.chinese: 最后针对价值漏损随实物期权的定价进行修正。

sentences.english: For search engines, mainly Baidu and GG, respectively, please answer.
sentences.chinese: 针对搜索引擎，主要是百度和GG，请分别解答。

sentences.english: Commercial projects need to be financed in operation period.
sentences.chinese: 运营期融资主要是针对商业房地产项目而成立。

sentences.english: LOHAS is responsive to customer's needs.
sentences.chinese: 乐活是针对客户的需求。

sentences.english: An Ethernet solution for the press machine with many towers is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 针对多塔系统，给出一个全网络化的解决方案。

sentences.english: An overview was made to the basic theory on the system simulation of vapor-compression refrigeration plants.
sentences.chinese: 针对蒸气压缩式制冷装置仿真的基本理论进行了总结。

sentences.english: Have you ever been treated for gingivitis or periodontitis?
sentences.chinese: 您针对牙龈炎或牙周炎治疗过吗？

sentences.english: “What do you say to the charges against you?” I ask.
sentences.chinese: “你怎么看待那些针对你的指控？”我问他说。

sentences.english: The performance of air traffic control system was evaluated by using Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP).
sentences.chinese: 针对管制中心系统，利用层次分析法评估其系统效能。

sentences.english: Infliximab and its side-effect profile are discussed, along with other associated complications.
sentences.chinese: 针对英利昔单抗的副作用和相关并发症进行了阐述。

sentences.english: The United States and other nations did nothing to deserve or invite this threat.
sentences.chinese: 这个针对美国和其他国家的威胁是没来由的。

sentences.english: BRM---Business Risk Management. It is to evaluate the business risk involved for any change in the process.
sentences.chinese: 针对流程的任何变革可能给业务带来的风险进行管理。

definition: to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)/to take
important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
because of/on the basis of/in view of/on account of
